movies.title: Inside Out
movies.overview: When 11-year-old Riley moves to a new city, her Emotions team up to help her through the transition. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness work together, but when Joy and Sadness get lost, they must journey through unfamiliar places to get back home.

movies.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
movies.overview: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

movies.title: MR-9: Do or Die
movies.overview: Masud Rana is a Secret Agent with code name MR-9 of the Bangladesh Counter Intelligence Agency

movies.title: Goyo
movies.overview: A young autistic museum guide lives by a strict routine — until he falls in love with his coworker and must confront a whirlwind of new, intense emotions.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
movies.overview: Po is gearing up to become the spiritual leader of his Valley of Peace, but also needs someone to take his place as Dragon Warrior. As such, he will train a new kung fu practitioner for the spot and will encounter a villain called the Chameleon who conjures villains from the past.

movies.title: My Fault
movies.overview: Noah must leave her city, boyfriend, and friends to move into William Leister's mansion, the flashy and wealthy husband of her mother Rafaela. As a proud and independent 17 year old, Noah resists living in a mansion surrounded by luxury. However, it is there where she meets Nick, her new stepbrother, and the clash of their strong personalities becomes evident from the very beginning.

movies.title: Twisters
movies.overview: As storm season intensifies, the paths of former storm chaser Kate Carter and reckless social-media superstar Tyler Owens collide when terrifying phenomena never seen before are unleashed. The pair and their competing teams find themselves squarely in the paths of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma in the fight of their lives.

movies.title: The Infallibles
movies.overview: When a gang of robbers provokes chaos in Paris and humiliates the police, the Minister of the Interior wants new blood at the helm of the investigation: Alia is from Marseille, fiery-tempered and unmanageable, Hugo is Parisian, valedictorian and meticulous. In short, they have every reason to hate each other. A forced alliance, for better or for worse, or maybe blossoming into something else?

movies.title: Autumn and the Black Jaguar
movies.overview: Grown up in the Amazon rainforest, Autumn lives with Hope, the cute baby jaguar she adopted. However, a circumstance forces Autumn to return to New York. Autumn goes back into the jungle to save Hope from grave danger.

movies.title: An Ideal Father
movies.overview: Michel, the jovial owner of the only café in a small Normandy town, sees his life turned upside down when his teenage daughter is murdered. The community has his back but soon rumor spreads and Michel is singled out. From the ideal father, he becomes the ideal culprit.

movies.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
movies.overview: Detective Ma Seok-do changes his affiliation from the Geumcheon Police Station to the Metropolitan Investigation Team, in order to eradicate Japanese gangsters who enter Korea to commit heinous crimes.

movies.title: The Last Kumite
movies.overview: When Karate champion Michael Rivers wins the last tournament of his career, shady businessman Ron Hall offers him the opportunity to fight in an illegal Kumite in Bulgaria against the world’s best martial artists.  When Michael declines, Hall has his daughter kidnapped and, in order to rescue her, Rivers is left with no choice but to compete in the deadly tournament. Arriving in Bulgaria, he finds out that he is not the only fighter whose loved one was taken. Rivers enlists the help of trainers Master Loren, and Julie Jackson but will it be enough for him to win the tournament and save his daughter’s life?

movies.title: The Fall Guy
movies.overview: Fresh off an almost career-ending accident, stuntman Colt Seavers has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job.

movies.title: The Watchers
movies.overview: A young artist gets stranded in an extensive, immaculate forest in western Ireland, where, after finding shelter, she becomes trapped alongside three strangers, stalked by mysterious creatures each night.

movies.title: Tarot
movies.overview: When a group of friends recklessly violate the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against death.

movies.title: Kleks Academy
movies.overview: A seemingly ordinary girl finds her way into the eponymous Academy to explore the world of fairy tales, imagination and creativity. With the help of a crazy, talented teacher, she develops her unique abilities and also stumbles upon a clue that will help her unravel the biggest secret of the family...

movies.title: IF
movies.overview: A young girl who goes through a difficult experience begins to see everyone's imaginary friends who have been left behind as their real-life friends have grown up.

movies.title: Out of Exile
movies.overview: Recently paroled thief Gabriel Russell tries to balance his life and mend a troubled family as an FBI agent hunts him down, along with his crew after a botched armored car robbery.

movies.title: Tyler Perry's Divorce in the Black
movies.overview: Ava, a young bank professional is devastated when her husband Dallas abandons a marriage she is determined to fight for until fate intervenes, revealing Dallas' wicked deeds that have trashed their marriage, and once upon a time sabotaged Ava's destiny to be loved by her true soulmate.

movies.title: Godzilla Minus One
movies.overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

comments.content: Inside Out is a beautiful exploration of emotions. The storyline is touching and brilliantly executed.
A heartwarming movie that shows the complexity of growing up. Joy and Sadness's journey is both entertaining and enlightening.
A must-watch for all ages. It’s fascinating how it explains feelings through characters.
Can't wait to see Deadpool and Wolverine team up! This movie is going to be epic.
Wolverine and Deadpool in one movie? Take my money now!
Excited to see how these two characters interact on screen. The trailer looks promising!
MR-9: Do or Die sounds like a thrilling spy movie. Looking forward to it!
A new secret agent on the block. Can’t wait to see how this one turns out.
Interesting plot! I hope the action scenes live up to the hype.
Goyo’s storyline about autism is so unique and touching. Eager to see this movie.
An emotional journey through love and routine. Goyo looks promising.
This film seems like it will be both heartwarming and insightful. Looking forward to it.
Kung Fu Panda 4! Po’s adventures never get old. Excited for the new villain.
The Chameleon sounds like an interesting antagonist. Can’t wait to see Po in action again!
Po’s journey to find a successor is going to be fun. Looking forward to this installment.
My Fault’s premise is intriguing. The dynamics between Noah and Nick should be interesting.
A story about adjusting to a new life and new relationships. Sounds like a great watch.
Curious to see how Noah and Nick’s relationship develops. The movie looks promising.
Twisters looks like a thrilling ride. Storm chasers and social media? Interesting mix!
The storm sequences in Twisters look intense. Can’t wait to see this!
A movie about storm chasers with a modern twist. Sounds exciting!
The Infallibles seems like a great mix of action and drama. Looking forward to it.
Alia and Hugo’s dynamic should be interesting. Can’t wait to see how their partnership unfolds.
A forced alliance that might turn into something more. The Infallibles looks promising.
Autumn and the Black Jaguar looks like a heartfelt adventure. Excited to see Autumn’s journey.
A story set in the Amazon rainforest with a cute jaguar. This should be interesting!
The bond between Autumn and Hope sounds touching. Looking forward to this movie.
An Ideal Father’s plot is gripping. Can’t wait to see how the story unfolds.
A community turning against one of their own. This movie looks intense.
The premise of An Ideal Father is intriguing. Excited to see the twists and turns.
The Roundup: No Way Out looks action-packed. Detective Ma Seok-do’s adventures are always thrilling.
Excited to see how Detective Ma tackles the Japanese gangsters. This movie should be great!
Another intense case for Detective Ma. The Roundup series never disappoints.
The Last Kumite looks like a classic martial arts movie. Can’t wait to see the action scenes.
Michael Rivers’ fight to save his daughter sounds intense. This movie should be a thrilling ride.
A deadly tournament and a fight to save a loved one. The Last Kumite is on my watch list.
The Fall Guy has an interesting premise. Excited to see how Colt Seavers handles the conspiracy.
A stuntman turned investigator. The Fall Guy looks promising.
Tracking down a movie star and solving a conspiracy. The Fall Guy should be an exciting watch.
The Watchers’ setting in the Irish forest is intriguing. Can’t wait to see how the story unfolds.
Stalked by mysterious creatures each night. The Watchers sounds thrilling.
A stranded artist and mysterious creatures. The Watchers looks like a great thriller.
Tarot’s premise about cursed cards is intriguing. Excited to see how the story plays out.
Violating the sacred rule of Tarot readings. This movie sounds chilling.
A race against death after unleashing an evil. Tarot should be a thrilling watch.
Kleks Academy looks magical. Can’t wait to see the world of fairy tales and imagination.
A girl discovering her unique abilities. Kleks Academy sounds like a great adventure.
Exploring creativity and imagination. Kleks Academy looks promising.
IF’s premise about imaginary friends is unique. Looking forward to this one.
Seeing everyone’s imaginary friends sounds interesting. IF should be a fun watch.
A young girl and imaginary friends. IF has a lot of potential.
Out of Exile’s story about a thief balancing his life sounds intriguing.
A paroled thief and an FBI agent on his trail. Out of Exile should be exciting.
Balancing life and mending a troubled family. Out of Exile looks intense.
Divorce in the Black’s plot about a young professional’s struggle sounds captivating.
A story of fighting for love and uncovering dark secrets. Divorce in the Black looks promising.
Ava’s journey sounds intense. Divorce in the Black should be a gripping watch.
Godzilla Minus One’s postwar Japan setting is intriguing. Looking forward to the epic battles.
Godzilla bringing new devastation. This movie looks like a thrilling ride.
Fighting back against an unrelenting horror. Godzilla Minus One is a must-watch.
